attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement for all pedal cyclists to have insurance & a number plate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With ever more reasons for people to turn to pedal cycles as an alternative form of transport, I feel that motorists and other road users should be afforded protection against any damage cyclists do to vehicles or indeed if a pedestrian is hurt.  Pursuing the cyclist through the private courts is not the answer when attempting to recover the costs of any vehicle repair work required - this of course assumes that you have been able to identify him/her in the first place.
